description:
## RDF cast
### This mapping shows how to use the [RDF cast action](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-rdf-cast) for changing the serialisation of some RDF data into another. Currently, supported input/output RDF serialisations are  turtle, ttl, json-ld, json-ld-11, rdf/xml, n-triples, nt, n3
user_template:
<#-- RDF data -->
<#assign rdf>
@prefix ex: <https://sample.es/resources/> .
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .

ex:Alice 
  a ex:Person ; 
  ex:ssn "987-65-432A" . 

ex:Bob 
  a ex:Person ; 
  ex:ssn "123-45-6789" ; 
  ex:ssn "124-35-6789" . 

ex:Calvin 
  a ex:Person ; 
  ex:birthDate "1971-07-07"^^xsd:date ; 
  ex:worksFor ex:UntypedCompany .
</#assign>

<#-- Setting up and running the action -->
<#assign config = {"data-format" : "turtle", "output-format" : "json-ld"}>
<@action type="RdfCast" data=rdf conf=config; result>
[=result]
</@action>
